title: What are some challenges you think the next generation will face? - Your talk... - Quora

response.answer_text: The next generation will face specific challenges from our world being contaminated by microfibers and nanoparticles. Both of these products are highly intrusive—nanoparticles can cross the placental and brain-blood barrier—which means that they present certain AND DANGEROUS health issues. One of the newcomers to this scene are carbon nanotubes. I have seen videos where no one in the laboratory wears masks or other personal protective equipment while being exposed to them. THEY ARE COMPLETE IDIOTS and such laxity ought to be punishable by law.
